text: Allah aro upama dicchena du'ijana lokera -- tadera ekajana boba, kono-kichute'i se ksamata rakhe na, se tara manibera upare ekati bojha, take yekhane'i pathano hoka na kena se bhala kichu'i anate pare na. Se ebam se'ibyakti yini n'yayabicarera nirdesa dena tara ki samana-samana, ara tini rayechena sahaja-sathika pathe
